name: Siloxanes and silicones, di-methyl, 3-(4-hydroxy-3-methoxy-3-methoxyphenyl)propyl group-terminated, polymers with bisphenol A, carbonic dichloride and 4-(1-methyl-1-phenylethyl)phenol
FoodContactSubstance: Siloxanes and silicones, di-methyl, 3-(4-hydroxy-3-methoxy-3-methoxyphenyl)propyl group-terminated, polymers with bisphenol A, carbonic dichloride and 4-(1-methyl-1-phenylethyl)phenol (CAS Reg. No. 202483-49-6; also known as siloxane-modified polycarbonate) where the siloxane-modified portion of the FCS is approximately 7 percent by weight of the FCS.
